hackathon-description-text: HackBaroda is Baroda's first hackathon event open to the masses, bringing together 100s of Gujarat's finest hackers.
hackathon-requirements:
If you have any questions, please ask the MVPs at the venue
Submission deadline: 11:00am
Note:
hackathon-rules:
Minors/Major may participate in Hack Baroda and any related events (e.g., parties, meals, practices, registration, etc.) (individually and collectively, an “Event”), with the signed consent of the minor’s parent or legal guardian. If a participant is under 18 years of age, he/she is considered a minor in as per jurisdiction else considered as major. All participants must submit this consent form, signed by a parent or legal guardian if participant is minor, so self signed upon entry to any Event. Any prizes won by a minor will be awarded to that minor’s parent or guardian identified on the consent form submitted.
Same applies for majors (Above 18)  who are participating

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Galileo board worth Rs. 7000 per participant + Vouchers worth Rs. 1500 per participant + Entry into HackIndia
Vouchers worth Rs. 1000 for each team-member
Vouchers worth Rs. 500 for each team-member
Best Jugaad award - sponsored by Rishabh Software
Awarded to Winner of HackBaroda Social Project

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: 2 points - for anything else judges find impressive
